holidays.title: League of Nations Day
holidays.description: Join us as we explore the fascinating origins and history of the League of Nations.

holidays.title: National Bittersweet Chocolate Day
holidays.description: Treat your taste buds with the tanginess of dark chocolate and gear up for one wild celebration!

holidays.title: National Cut Your Energy Costs Day
holidays.description: Wasting energy is among the nastiest things we can do in life, and to the planet.

holidays.title: National Oysters Rockefeller Day
holidays.description: Quick! Get your fork and spoon — there’s a half-shell culinary wonder that needs our attention.

holidays.title: National Save The Eagles Day
holidays.description: Get a birds-eye view of freedom, grit, and democracy as we learn about America’s majestic bird.

holidays.title: National Shareholders Day
holidays.description: Get your stocks up, it’s National Shareholders Day! Join us as we learn more.

holidays.title: National Take the Stairs Day
holidays.description: How are you getting around today? We hope you’re taking the stairs wherever you can.

holidays.title: Peculiar People Day
holidays.description: Where’s the fun in being normal? Let’s get extra-ordinary and do great exploits.

holidays.title: Ben Azelart’s Birthday
holidays.description: The famous and talented YouTuber Ben Azelart is an inspiration to young people.

holidays.title: Pat Benatar’s Birthday
holidays.description: Pat Benatar’s music is addictive! She is one of the most successful musicians in America.

holidays.title: Rod Stewart’s Birthday
holidays.description: A two-time cancer survivor, this energetic musician is an inspiration to millions.

holidays.title: Sisi Stringer’s Birthday
holidays.description: The young Sisi Stringer is the new trendsetter in Hollywood, and we’re impressed by her talent.
